description: Dan Jenkins is no stranger to being naughty, only this time Sebastian finds out and summons Dan to the penthouse living room to be punished. After having strong words with Dan, Seb has him over his knee to spank him hard to remind him that being naughty has a price! After a long, hard spanking Dan shows Seb remorse asking for forgiveness but this means nothing, Seb removes Dan's pants to spank his bare bottom before demanding that Dan beats-off for Seb's pleasure.
title: Dan Jenkins & Sebastian Kane
